actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection

official_title: To amend the Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 and the Textile Fiber Products Identification Act to require that labeling required under those Acts identify products processed or manufactured in a territory of the United States.
short_title: United States Territories Truth in Labelling Act of 2001

summary.text: United States Territories Truth in Labelling Act of 2001 - Amends the Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939, and the Textile Fiber Products Identification Act, respectively, to require that labels identify wool and textile fiber products processed or manufactured in territories of the United States.

titles.title: United States Territories Truth in Labelling Act of 2001

To amend the Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 and the Textile Fiber Products Identification Act to require that labeling required under those Acts identify products processed or manufactured in a territory of the United States.
